text: "Just Can't Get Enough" is a 1981 song by British band Depeche Mode and is the third single from their debut album Speak & Spell. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom and number 4 in Australia. ==The Saturdays version== "Just Can't Get Enough" was covered in 2009 by British all girl band The Saturdays and was released for Comic Relief. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Depeche Mode songs
title: Just Can't Get Enough (Depeche Mode song)
